name: Ice break Boards
description:
Today where the remote culture has grown exponentially as a result of the pandemic and many teams have been built during this eventuality (like us at Toasty) and we have learned that the dynamics that allow you to break the ice, know more about your teammates result in more trust and rapport with team members, which is key to getting the job done.


Since sharing is living we have decided to publish one of our Boards : Check in Icebreaker.


Toasty is integrated with Figma
